posts.name: Graeter's Ice Cream - Westerville, OH
posts.note: Longtime ice cream parlor chain serving small-batch scoops plus baked goods at some locations.

posts.name: Schmidt's Sausage Shop
posts.note: All-you-can-eat sausage buffet and don't forget to order the huge chocolate cream puffs.

posts.name: Thurman Cafe
posts.note: Bustling, rustic American haunt with oversized, toppings-loaded burgers and a full bar.
